Apgar EBX Common Library

Packages
Package
Description
com.apgar.common.lib.constants
Offers generic constraints for fields and tables, along with a base class for accessing messages from the resource bundle.
com.apgar.common.lib.constraint
Defines constants for EBX, including common variable names, environment variable identifiers, and workflow process constants.
com.apgar.common.lib.filter
Provides common UI table filters.
com.apgar.common.lib.lineage
Defines the paths for commonly used tracking information fields.
com.apgar.common.lib.mail
Enables sending emails in various formats using the specified mail configuration.
com.apgar.common.lib.procedure
Contains helper classes for procedures to inactivate and restore settings.
com.apgar.common.lib.properties
Provides access to various properties files, including EBX properties, text properties, error properties, and localized resource files.
com.apgar.common.lib.rules
Includes common rules, such as setting record metadata and field timestamps, retrieving foreign key labels, and obtaining relative paths.
com.apgar.common.lib.scheduledtask
Contains common ScheduledTask.
com.apgar.common.lib.service
Includes common services for tables, datasets, and dataspaces, covering both declarations and user services.
com.apgar.common.lib.service.declaration
Includes declarations for the user services defined here.
com.apgar.common.lib.service.validation
Provides validation services for tables, datasets, and dataspaces.
com.apgar.common.lib.trigger
Provides common table triggers.
com.apgar.common.lib.ui.widget
Contains common widgets with their corresponding factories.
com.apgar.common.lib.ui.widget.highlightwidget
Contains the highlight widget, its corresponding factory, and an abstract widget for extending to accommodate additional widgets that work along with the highlight widget.
com.apgar.common.lib.ui.widget.passwordwidget
Contains the password widget and its corresponding factory.
com.apgar.common.lib.ui.widget.readonlywidget
Contains the read-only widget and its corresponding factory.
com.apgar.common.lib.utils
Provides common utilities for datasets, user services, workflows, validation, tracking information, and module loaders.
com.apgar.common.lib.workflow
Provides common workflow functionalities, including launchers, script tasks, and user tasks.
com.apgar.common.lib.workflow.launcher
Provides common utilities for launching workflows.
com.apgar.common.lib.workflow.scripttask
Provides common script task beans.
com.apgar.common.lib.workflow.usertask
Provides common user tasks along with generic abstract tasks for extension.
